channel.title: DeviceSpecifications
channel.description: Mobile device specifications, comparisons, news, user reviews and ratings

item.title: TCL 20S, TCL 20 Pro 5G, and TCL 20 SE go on sale in the USA
item.description: TCL announced the availability of three 20 series smartphones - the TCL 20 Pro 5G, the TCL 20S, and the TCL 20 SE - in the United States, along with the TCL MOVEAUDIO S600 true wireless earbuds. The trio of mobile devices provide high-resolution displays, stylish designs and more flagship-style smartphone features at a variety of price points, strengthening the company's winning value...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Phantom X by Tecno is announced with a 50MP main camera and a 48MP selfie snapper
item.description: The Phantom X is the first model from Tecno's new Phantom brand. It places its bets on competing on all fronts with major upper-mid-range smartphones. For starters, this new device has a 3D curved 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display with a 90Hz refresh rate, FHD+ resolution (1080 x 2340), in-display fingerprint sensor. It is protected by a Corning Gorilla Glass 5. A pill-shaped hole in the display is...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy M32 goes official in India with an sAMOLED display, 90Hz refesh rate, Helio G80 chipset
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy M32 is announced in India. Markete with the #BingeMonster tag, this device is built around a 6.4-inch Super AMOLED display with an FHD+ resolution, 90Hz refresh rate, and 800 nits of brightness in high brightness mode. An in-display fingerprint sensor and a U-shaped notch finish off the screen's main specs. The notch houses a 20MP front-facing camera. On the back, there's a...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: The Doogee S97 Pro with a laser rangefinder is launched
item.description: The Doogee S97 Pro is Dooggee's latest flagship rugged smartphone. The device has just been launched and its most distinctive feature is the laser rangefinder. It can be used both at work, outdoors, or indoors at home. The device has a range of 40 meters and has eight measurement modes - a single measurement, such as a continuous measurement as the user walks, an area measurement, where the...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Our in-depth Cubot KingKong 5 Pro review is ready
item.description: Our Cubot KingKong 5 Pro full review is now ready. As usual, we provide you with detailed information about every aspect of the smartphone, including various measurements, tests, lots of photos, graphs, comparison tables, and screenshots. If you want to acquaint yourself with this smartphone in detail, here are the separate pages from our in-depth review: Cubot KingKong 5 Pro specifications and...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: The Honor 50 Pro, Honor 50, and Honor 50 SE go official, feature Google Media Services support
item.description: The Honor 50 series was announced in China including a trio of smartphones. All three are based on Android 11 with Magic UI 4.2 on top. The models for the international market will support Google Media Services. The Honor 50 Pro is the top model of the three. It is adorned with a 6.72-inch AMOLED display with an FHD+ resolution, 120Hz display, 300Hz touch sampling rate, dynamic switching between...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: OnePlus and Oppo are merging
item.description: It is widely known that Vivo, Oppo, OnePlus, iQOO, and Realme are brands under BBK Electronics. Last year, OnePlus and Oppo started integrating some of their departments, including the R&D one. Today, the companies further unveiled their depending merger. As Pete Lau says in an address on the OnePLus forum, "With this deeper integration with OPPO, we will have more resources at hand to create...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: The global Realme GT goes official, prices start from EUR 449
item.description: Back in March, Realme announced the China-bound Realme GT and today, the company unveiled the global version of the model - the Realme GT Global. If we don't mind the different naming of three colors (yellow, blue, and silver) and the regional differences of supported network bands, all the rest is the same The smartphone packs a Snapdragon 888 chipset with 8GB or 12GB of LPDDR5 RAM and 128GB of...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: OnePlus Nord N200 5G is unveiled with a 6.49" FHD+ display, 90Hz refresh rate and Snapdragon 480G chipset
item.description: The OnePlus Nord N200 5G is announced featuring a Snapdragon 480G chipset ensuring reasonable performance, power efficiency, and 5G connectivity. The front of the smartphone is adorned with a 6.49-inch IPS display with an FHD+ resolution and a 90Hz refresh rate. A punch hole in the top left corner of the display houses the 16MP selfie snapper. On the back, there's a triple camera module headed by...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Our in-depth Blackview BV6600 review is ready
item.description: Our Blackview BV6600 full review is now ready. If you want to acquaint yourself with this smartphone in detail, here are the separate pages from our in-depth review: Blackview BV6600 specifications and unboxing...

item.title: Doogee S86 Pro goes on sale on June 15 with a discount
item.description: After confirming the specs and launch date of the S86 Pro, Doogee has now announced that at launch this rugged smartphone will go on sale with a discount. The world premiere is set to happen on Doogee's official stores on both AliExpress and Banggood platforms. From June 15th - 20th, this phone will retail at US $169.99, US$ 80 down from its original price of US $249.99. You can also enter the...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Blackview Tab 8E gets a 35% discount on Amazon, coupons
item.description: If Amazon is your preferred online vendor you can now get the Blackview Tab 8E for a 35% discount. Here are the exact prices and coupons for the model: Buy Gray colored Blackview Tab 8E for €103.99 with coupon code MQBELI2U, applies for 444 units until June 12 Buy Gold colored Blackview Tab 8E for €103.99 with coupon code H4SAVQGE, applies for 444 units until June 12 The Blackview Tab 8E is...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: OnePlus Nord CE 5G is unveiled with Snapdragon 750G and a 64MP main camera
item.description: The OnePlus Nord CE 5G has been unveiled packing a Snapdragon 750G chipset. It supports 5G connectivity and is paired with 6GB, 8GB or 12GB of LPDDR4X RAM and 128GB ор 256GB of UFS 2.1 storage that can be expanded. The front is adorned with a 6.43-inch Fluid AMOLED display with an FHD+ resolution and a 90Hz refresh rate. The punch hole in the top-left corner houses a 16MP selfie snapper. On the...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: The POCO M3 Pro launches in India on June 14
item.description: On June 14, people in India can buy the POCO M3 Pro 5G. The main platform will be Flipkart. The device will cost INR 13,499 (13,999) for the 4GB+64GB variant and INR 15,499 (15,999) for the 6GB+128GB version. If you want to acquaint yourself with this smartphone in detail, here are the separate pages from our in-depth review of the POCO M3 Pro 5G: POCO M3 Pro 5G specifications and unboxing POCO...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Vivo Y53s 5G is the Vivo Y52s (t1 edition) but with a 64MP main camera instead
item.description: Vivo is launching sequences of smartphones that do not differ a lot from each other. This is the case with the Vivo Y53s 5G which is the Vivo Y52s (t1 edition) but with a 64MP main camera instead. In all else, the two models are identical. There's a 6.58-inch IPS display with an FHD+ resolution, 90Hz refresh rate, and a 1500:1 static contrast ratio. A 5000 mAh battery with an 18W charger keeps...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Counterpoint Q1 2021 Market Monitor report - Samsung leads the smartphone shipments
item.description: Counterpoint has published its Q1 2021 Market Monitor report. Some of the key findings include the following: Global smartphone shipments gre by 20% YoY but declined by 10% QoQ. For a second quarter, India's smartphone market declines. It is led by Xiaomi with a 26% market share, ineased by 8% YoY. Samsung is again the world leader in smartphones with a 22% market share. Apple is second with 17%...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Apple previews new iPad productivity features with iPadOS 15
item.description: Apple today previewed iPadOS 15, with new features that take advantage of the unique capabilities of iPad, helping users be more productive and taking the versatility of iPad even further. iPadOS 15 introduces a multitasking experience that is even more intuitive, making features like Split View and Slide Over easier to discover, easier to use, and more powerful. Notes goes systemwide with Quick...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Apple iOS 15 - new features and availability
item.description: Apple today announced iOS 15, a major update with powerful features that enhance the iPhone experience. iOS 15 makes FaceTime calls more natural, introduces SharePlay for shared experiences, helps users focus and be in the moment with new ways to manage notifications, and brings more intelligence to photos and search to quickly access information. Apple Maps unveils beautiful new ways to explore...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: The Doogee S97 Pro main specifications are unveiled, goes on sale on June 21
item.description: Doogee is one of the main players in the rugged smartphone market and the Doogee S series has iterated some of the best rugged smartphones, each of which has a special feature. The latest addition to the series is the Doogee S97 Pro. The first time this smartphone has been mentioned was only to tease its special feature a - built-in laser rangefinder. This can be used both at work, outdoors, or...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

If you want to acquaint yourself with this smartphone in detail, here are the separate pages from our in-depth review: Samsung Galaxy A52 5G specifications and...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Doogee S86 Pro specifications confirmed, will go on sale on June 15, giveaway in tow
item.description: Doogee is already widely known for its quality rugged smartphone lineup. The latest addition to the Doogee S series of ruggedized devices is the Doogee S86 Pro. The focal point of its specifications is the built-in infrared thermometer. It is placed in the camera module on the back of the handset - the top right one. It is enough just to open the corresponding app, place the device 2-3 cm from...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: The Vivo Y70t goes official in China with minor changes from the Vivo Y70s
item.description: Vivo is continuing to offer variants of smartphones that are already announced. The latest device is the Vivo Y70t for China. This smartphone is a variant of the Vivo Y70s which was announced 12 days ago. The brand didn't even bother to change the model codes and both are designated as V2002A. The two devices have identical footprints, batteries, displays, chipsets. Each is powered by a 5000 mAh...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G and Galaxy A22 4G go official
item.description: Samsung has announced a pair of affordable smartphones today including the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G and the Samsung Galaxy A22 4G. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G features a 6.6-inch FHD+ Infinity-V display. The device is powered by a 5000 mAh battery with a 15W charger. The camera department includes a 48MP main shooter, a 5MP ultra-wide unit, and a 2MP depth-sensing lens. On the front, there's an 8MP...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: The rugged Doogee S86 Pro goes official with an infrared thermometer
item.description: Doogee has unveiled the Doogee S86 Pro - this is the Doogee S86 with more RAM - 8GB instead of 6GB, and an infrared thermometer replacing the macro camera on the back panel. All the rest is the same, including the 6.09-inch IPS display with an HD+ resolution (720 x 1560), Corning Gorilla Glass, and glove mode support. The old and reliable Helio P60 chipset ticks under the hood. There are 128 GB...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: POCO India teases the POCO F3 GT, will be unveiled in Q3 of 2021
item.description: POCO India has teased the POCO F3 GT. This smartphone is expected to be launched in the third quarter of this year and will be an international version of the Redmi K40 Gaming Edition, which was announced a month ago. Assuming, this turns out to be right, the POCO F3 GT should be based on a Dimensity 1200 chipset with APU 3.0 and a three-layered cooling system with VC. There will be 6GB/8GB/12GB...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Realme X7 Max 5G - the Realme GT Neo for the global market
item.description: The Realme GT Neo is a China-bound model and today Realme announced its global version - the Realme X7 Max 5G. Both smartphones are based on a MediaTek Dimensity 1200 chipset with 8GB/12GB of LPDDR4X RAM and 128GB/256GB of UFS 3.1 storage. The latter cannot be expanded. The devices run on Android 11 with realme UI 2.0 on top. They are built around a 6.43-inch Super AMOLED display with an FHD+...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: UMIDIGI A11 is launched with a 6.53" HD+ IPS display, Helio G25 chipset, infrared thermometer
item.description: The UMIDGI A11 has been launched priced at USD 120 for the 3GB+64GB version and USD 14 for the 4GB+128GB version. This smartphone has a 6.53-inch in-cell IPS display with a resolution of 720 x 1600 pixels and a waterdrop notch for the 8MP front-facing camera with an f/2.2 aperture and a 5-element lens. A side-mounted fingerprint sensor is embedded in the power button on the right frame of the...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Samsung Display and LG Display have begun producing OLED panels for Apple's iPhone 13 series
item.description: South Korean news outlet The Elec reports that Samsung Display and LG Display have begun producing OLED panels for the upcoming iPhone 13 series. Compared to last year, this is a month faster. Last year Apple experienced problems procuring components for its devices resulting in delaying the launch of the iPhone 12 series. Hence, the earlier start of display production for this year's models is...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Ulefone unveils the Armor 11T 5G with an infrared thermal camera
item.description: After unveiling the Armor 11 5G in February, Ulefone is now unveiling a version of this model that boasts an infrared thermal camera. The new smartphone is called Ulefone Armor 11T 5G. It is identical to the previous model with the only difference being the rear camera department. The Armor 11T has a 48MP main shooter with an f/1.79 aperture, 79-degree FoV. It is adjoined by a 2MP depth-sensing...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications

item.title: Oppo Reno6, Reno6 Pro, and Reno6 Pro+ are announced in China - specs and prices
item.description: Oppo has unveiled the Reno6 series today in China. Let's begin with the top model - the Oppo Reno6 Pro+ which is based on a Snapdragon 870 chipset and is powered by a 4500 mAh battery with 65W fast charging support. The smartphone is built around a 3D curved 6.55-inch AMOLED display with an FHD+ resolution and 90Hz refresh rate, 1100 nits of peak brightness and 100% DCI-P3 color space coverage...
item.author: DeviceSpecifications
